birthDate.description: Specifies the employee's date of birth.

displayName.description: Specifies the employee's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the employee.

employmentDate.description: Specifies the date when the employee began to work for the company.

givenName.description: The given name of the employee.

id.description: The unique ID of the employee. Non-editable.

jobTitle.description: The job title of the employee.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the employee was modified. Read-Only.

middleName.description: The middle name of the employee.

number.description: Specifies the number of the employee.

personalEmail.description: Specifies the employee's personal email address.

status.description: Specifies the status of the employee. It can be "Active", "Inactive" or "Terminated".

terminationDate.description: Specifies the date when the employee was terminated, due to retirement or dismissal, for example.
